statements: SELECT * FROM Political_Organizations WHERE organization_name = 'Green Party';
SELECT organization_name, donation_amount FROM Political_Organizations WHERE donation_amount > 500;
SELECT donor_name, donation_date FROM Political_Organizations ORDER BY donation_date DESC;
SELECT organization_id, organization_name, donor_name FROM Political_Organizations WHERE donation_amount >= 1000;
SELECT * FROM Political_Organizations ORDER BY organization_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Political_Organizations WHERE donation_amount > 1000 ORDER BY donation_amount DESC;
SELECT organization_name, donor_name FROM Political_Organizations WHERE donation_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT organization_name, donation_amount, donation_date FROM Political_Organizations WHERE donor_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT organization_id, organization_name FROM Political_Organizations WHERE donation_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY donation_date ASC;
SELECT organization_name, donation_amount FROM Political_Organizations GROUP BY organization_name HAVING SUM(donation_amount) > 5000 ORDER BY SUM(donation_amount) DESC;
SELECT * FROM donations WHERE donation_id = 1;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 500;
SELECT * FROM donations ORDER BY donation_date DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donations WHERE donor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_budget < 10000;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donations WHERE donation_date = '2022-05-01';
SELECT * FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 1000;
SELECT donor_name, donation_date FROM donations ORDER BY donation_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_start_date, campaign_end_date FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_budget < 5000 ORDER BY campaign_start_date;
SELECT donation_id, donor_name, donation_amount, donation_date FROM donations WHERE donor_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT * FROM online_donations;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM online_donations WHERE donation_date = '2022-09-15';
SELECT donation_date, donor_name, donation_amount FROM online_donations ORDER BY donation_date DESC;
SELECT org_name, org_leader FROM political_organizations WHERE org_location = 'Washington';
SELECT campaign_name, funding_received, funding_goal FROM campaign_funding WHERE funding_received > funding_goal;
SELECT donation_id, donor_name, donation_amount, donation_date FROM online_donations ORDER BY donation_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM online_donations WHERE donor_name IN ('Alice', 'Bob', 'Charlie');
SELECT campaign_name, funding_received, funding_goal FROM campaign_funding WHERE funding_received > 10000 ORDER BY funding_received ASC;
SELECT org_name, org_leader, org_location FROM political_organizations WHERE org_location = 'Washington, D.C.';
SELECT donation_id, donor_name, donation_amount, donation_date FROM online_donations WHERE donation_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY donation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM donations;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM campaigns ORDER BY campaign_end_date DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donor_city, donor_state FROM donors WHERE donor_state = 'CA';
SELECT * FROM expenditures WHERE description LIKE '%important%';
SELECT * FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 1000
SELECT donation_id, donor_name, donation_amount FROM donations WHERE donation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT donor_name, SUM(donation_amount) AS total_donation FROM donations GROUP BY donor_name
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_start_date, campaign_end_date FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_start_date < '2021-06-01'
SELECT donor_name, donor_city, donor_state FROM donors WHERE donor_state = 'CA'
SELECT * FROM donations;
SELECT donation_id, donor_name, donation_amount FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 1000;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donations ORDER BY donation_date DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donations WHERE donor_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donations WHERE donation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 1000 ORDER BY donation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT DISTINCT donor_name, email_address FROM donors WHERE contact_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT campaign_name, candidate_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 3;
SELECT funder_name, industry, SUM(contribution_amount) AS total_contribution FROM funders GROUP BY funder_name ORDER BY total_contribution DESC;
